Class orderOptionsController

java.lang.Object
orderOptionsController
public class orderOptionsController extends Object
Class responsible for making any modifications to a drink

This class is responsible for storing a drink's toppings, sweetness level,ice level, and quantity

    • actionAddToOrderButton

      public void actionAddToOrderButton()
      Button action to add the drink to the current order

      This method will add a drink to the order by gathering the orderID, beverageInfoID, the name of the drink, the quantity of the drink, the iceLevel, sweetnessLevel, size of the drink , the price of the drink, toppings for the drink, and the assoicated action to the topping, and inserts it into the database. It will also create a Drink Object and add that object to an array of drinks stored in the current order object. It will then switch the scene to orderSummary.

    • actionBackToMenuButton

      public void actionBackToMenuButton()
      Button action to return back to the main menu

      This method will switch back to the main menu scene.
